You need Flash Decompiler Trillix 3.0.3 Portable:

Download Flash Decompiler Trillix

üìù Steps

  1. Go to client folder: Client location\data\main
  2. Rename Login.dat ‚Üí Login.swf
  3. Open Flash Decompiler Trillix Portable.
  4. In Trillix, open the Login.swf file you just renamed.
  5. Go to Edit tab and select Images.
  6. Find ID 245 in the Images list.
  7. Open Image Properties.
  8. Replace the image with your own background.
  9. Save changes in Trillix.
  10. Rename Login.swf back to Login.dat.
